# AsyncStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy.unbounded

**Case**

Continue to add to the buffer, without imposing a limit on the number of buffered elements.

## Declaration

```swift
case unbounded
```

## Buffering Policies

- **AsyncStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy.bufferingOldest(_:)**: When the buffer is full, discard the newly received element.
- **AsyncStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy.bufferingNewest(_:)**: When the buffer is full, discard the oldest element in the buffer.

items.description: When the buffer is full, discard the newly received element.
items.name: AsyncStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy.bufferingOldest(_:)

items.description: When the buffer is full, discard the oldest element in the buffer.
